mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) AS recordsTotal FROM bb_order_refund_applications bora LEFT JOIN bb_orders bo ON bora.order_id = bo.id INNER JOIN bb_order_appointments boa ON bora.order_id = boa.order_id INNER join bb_rooms br ON boa.room_id = br.id
AND br.org_id = #{staff.orgId}
AND (CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(bo.created_at, '%Y%m%d'), LPAD(bo.id, 6, 0)) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{criteria.orderNo},'%'))
AND br.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{criteria.roomName},'%')
AND boa.contact_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{criteria.contactName},'%')
AND boa.contact_mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{criteria.contactMobile},'%')

SELECT bora.id, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(bo.created_at, '%Y%m%d'), LPAD(bo.id, 6, 0)) AS orderNo, br.project_name AS projectName, br.name AS roomName, boa.contact_name AS contactName, boa.contact_mobile AS contactMobile, bora.amount, bora.confirm_amount AS confirmAmount, bora.status, bora.created_at AS createdAt, bora.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM bb_order_refund_applications bora LEFT JOIN bb_orders bo ON bora.order_id = bo.id INNER JOIN bb_order_appointments boa ON bora.order_id = boa.order_id INNER join bb_rooms br ON boa.room_id = br.id
AND br.org_id = #{staff.orgId}
AND (CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(bo.created_at, '%Y%m%d'), LPAD(bo.id, 6, 0)) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{criteria.orderNo},'%'))
AND br.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{criteria.roomName},'%')
AND boa.contact_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{criteria.contactName},'%')
AND boa.contact_mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{criteria.contactMobile},'%')
ORDER BY bora.id DESC LIMIT #{start},#{length}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bb_order_refund_applications (account_id, account_name, order_id, amount, confirm_amount) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{accountName}, #{orderId}, #{amount}, #{confirmAmount})
